text: Bernd Thiele (24 January 1956 – 26 March 2017) was a German footballer. He made 178 appearances in the Bundesliga and played 91 matches in the 2. Bundesliga for Schalke 04 and Hannover 96. == References == == External links == * Category:German footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Association football midfielders Category:Bundesliga players Category:2. Bundesliga players Category:FC Schalke 04 players Category:Hannover 96 players Category:1956 births Category:2017 deaths
title: Bernd Thiele
